attributes.action: admit that modern politics does not liberate the individual and is in fact a weapon of suppression
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the majority of peoploe in this country are fed up with ALL the main political parties, the only reason that we still vote for them ( or not as turnout proves) is that there is not yet a viable alternative. a new movement dedicated to emancipation for EVERYBODY- not just the priveleged- must emerge.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
